body.name: ROVSUN 21LBS Portable Washing Machine, Washer(14LBS) and Spinner(7LBS), Mini Compact Twin Tub Washer and Dryer Combo with Pump Draining, Great for Dorms Apartments RV Camping (White & Black)
features: 【Easy to Operate】Simple design of the operation panel, wash timer, wash options, drain options, and spin timer, more easier to use. Allows you to simply put in your load of clothes, fill with water, set the timer and start washing. You can choose the suitable time based on clothes types.

【21LBS Large Capacity】Total capacity: 21lbs (washer:14lbs, spinner:7lbs), for doing light to heavy laundry loads. Perfect for washing various clothes, like T-shirt, trousers and towel etc. Use it to relieves you from hand washing! Save your time and wash more clean!

【Equip with Drain Pump】 Built-in drain pump drains dirty water. You can choose drain water to a higher position or a convenient place randomly. It is also equipped with a drain hose to easily drain out dirty water. More easier and suitable for most family.

【Upgrade Design】With the first-grade stainless steel & plastic & PP material, it doesn't break your clothes during laundry. And it can keep your clothes as new! This unit features a 1300RPM powerful motor with a max frequency of 60Hz to wash more clean!

【Portable & Widely Use】With a total weight of around 30.8 pounds, it can be easily moved and transported. The size of 25" x 15" x 28.5" (L x W x H) is suitable for limited space. Space-saving design for easy storage in apartments, dorms, RVs, bathroom or any other places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow Great Buy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Wow I’m so pleased with this purchase this machine is no joke a high quality machine…And I was surprised to see how much clothes this machine can hold… it’s equivalent to a large machine at the laundromat 😃It’s a must have if I had a con it would be that the holes does not it my faucet I fill the machine with 1-4 buckets of water depending on the size of the load….But I don’t mind it’s so worth it !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No funciona correctamente
reviews.reviewText: Tenía la esperanza de hacer lavados en pequeñas cantidades para no anular ropa sucia. Puse a lavar la ropa y cuando estuvo lista para la tina de escurrido-secado, ésta no funcionó correctamente, , no tiene velocidad y no le saca el agua a la ropa , tampoco drena el agua de ninguna de las partes, Tuve que hacerlo con una vasija y volteando la lavadora para sacarle el resto de agua..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure yet
reviews.reviewText: 1st, like most ppl say, the hose & cord is way too short, especially seeing how they're on opposite sides of the machine. It would have been better if the cord & hose was on the same side. 2nd, the instructions are horrible. Running a load is pretty much common sense but as far as just info about the machine, nothing 3rdly & the most frustrating thing is after u drain it, if you move it around you can still hear water laying in the bottom of the machine. That isn't good & it worries me. That will eventually start ro mold & stink. 4th, even if it ISN'T switched to drain, if the hose falls over, it will leak everywhere!I finished a wash, unplugged & went to slide it iver to my tub & the hose fell (bc the little attachment that holds the hose is so cheap & loose) and water went EVERYWHERE... I was so so so excited for this machine & kinda still am but these few issues have kinda dimmed my excitement. Especially the fact it doesn't drain the water completely & leaves water behind. Like what am I suppose to do, lift it & dump it upside down?Anyway, I want a longer stronger hose (bc the one it comes with is EXTREMELY flimsy thin junk) so I contacted the seller in hopes they can let me know what size hose & if I can totally swap it out or if I can only add an extension. Hoping they respond soon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It got the job done but my clothes had a distinct mildew smell after also it was so much work to get a load of laundry done. It’s also incredibly loud… like REALLY loud. I would recommend this to someone who doesn’t have anyone that lives below them and has a tiny amount of laundry to do
